content: Blessedness of the Fear of the Lord.
Who walks in His ways  lives according to His commandments.
For you shall eat the fruit of [the labor of] your hands,
You will be happy  blessed and it will be well with you.
Your wife shall be like a fruitful vine
Within the innermost part of your house;
Your children will be like olive plants
Behold, for so shall the man be blessed  divinely favored
Who fears the  [and worships Him with obedience].
